column1: Daily Weather Observations for Bombala, New South Wales for April 2021
Prepared at 13:00 UTC on Wednesday 20 October 2021   IDCJDW2015.202104
Most observations from Bombala automatic weather station, but some from Bombala (Therry Street).
The Automatic Weather Station is a at Lillianfels, about 10 km south of Bombala.
Temperature, humidity, wind, pressure and rainfall observations are from Bombala AWS {station 070328}
Cloud observations are from Bombala (Therry Street) {station 070005}
